User.BookingCancelled: Hi {user}!! Your MM Booking {bookingId} has been cancelled as per your request. Looking forward to serving you again.
User.BookingSuccess: Thank you for using MM services!! Booking ({bookingId}) confirmed for Date Time : {pickDate}, Vehicle Model : {vehical}, Service Type : {service}, Service Station : {centre}. In case of any help, please feel free to contact us at +919890778343 or write to us at care@milemates.com
User.DropOffInitiated: Hi {user}!! Your vehicle has been out from our service station and will be delivered back to you in next 30 minutes.
User.PaymentDone: Hi {user}!! Payment of INR {totalAmount} towards MM has been successfully completed. Thanks for choosing MM. Looking forward to serving you again.
User.PickUpDone: Hi {user}!! Your vehicle has been picked up by MM authorised service station. You will be notified once your vehicle reach our service station.
User.PickUpSuccess: Hi {user}!! Your vehicle has reached our authorised service station. You will soon get a quotation call from the service station after inspection of your vehicle.
User.RegistrationCompleted: Welcome {user} to the MM family!! We wish you a pleasant servicing experience and look forward to ferrying you again.
User.RegistrationOtp: Your One Time Password is {Otp} for registration with MM.
User.ServiceCompleted: Hi {user}!! Servicing for your vehicle through MM has been completed. The total billed amount for the servicing is INR {totalAmount}. If COD selected please pay up the amount on Vehicle Drop Off.
User.Offer: Greetings from MM!! You have been offered a discount of INR {inr} for you Booking {bookingId} and your coupon code is {code}. You can avail this discount on your next booking.
User.BookingUpdate: Hi {user}!! Your MM Booking {bookingId} has been updated successfully. Your new pick-up Date Time is: {pickDate} and new drop-off Date Time is: {dropDate}.
User.BookingRemainder: Hi {user}!! This is a gentle reminder for your car service booking scheduled with MM for {make} {model} today at {pickDate}.
User.DropOffDone: Hi {user}!! Your vehicle has been successfully delivered by MM authorised service station. Thanks for choosing MM. Looking forward to serving you again.
User.QuotationAccepted: Hi {user}!! We noticed that quotation of INR {inr} for Booking {bookingId} is accepted by you. Final amount for your {make} {model} of {service} is INR {inr}.
User.QuotationRejected: Hi {user}!! We noticed that you rejected service station quotation. Now we are continuing our work with your selected service {service} of {make} {model}. Final amount you need to pay is {totalAmount}.
User.ExtraAmount: Hi {user}!! Remaining amount of INR {inr} for service {service} of {make} {model} is due. Please pay this amount by clicking on {link} or pay this amount at the time of drop-off.

ServiceCentre.ServicingConfirmation: Booking Confirmation from MM!! Booking Id : {bookingId}, Vehicle Make : {vehical}, Service : {service}, Pick Up Address : {pickAdd}, Pick Up Date and Time : {pickTime}, Drop Off Date and Time : {dropTime},Total Amount:{totalAmount}, Payment mode : {paymentMod}.
ServiceCentre.ServicingQuotationAccepted: Quotation request of INR {inr} for Booking {bookingId} for {model} {make} is accepted by customer. Final amount for {make} {model} of {service} is INR {inr}.
ServiceCentre.ServicingQuotationRejected: Quotation request of INR {inr} for Booking {bookingId} for {model} {make} is rejected by customer. Now please continue servicing in INR {inr} for service {service} of {make} {model}.
ServiceCentre.ServiceCodPayment: We noticed that you completed service for Booking {bookingId} for {model} {make}. Please charge INR {inr} at the time of drop-off the vehicle as customer selected COD option for this service.
ServiceCentre.ServiceOnlinePayment: We noticed that you completed service for Booking {bookingId} for {model} {make}. Please drop-off the vehicle on {dropDate}. We received the payment of INR {inr} for this service.
ServiceCentre.ServicePickRemainder: Pick-up is scheduled for Booking Id : {bookingId}, Vehicle Make : {vehical}, Service : {service}, Pick Up Address : {pickAdd}, Pick Up Date and Time : {pickTime}.
ServiceCentre.ServiceDropRemainder: Drop-off is scheduled for Booking Id : {bookingId}, Vehicle Make : {vehical}, Service : {service}, Pick Up Address : {pickAdd}, Pick Up Date and Time : {pickTime}.
ServiceCentre.ServiceOrderUpdate: Pick-up and Drop-off details are updated by customer. New Pick-up Date Time : {pickDate} & Drop-off Date Time : {dropDate} for Booking Id : {bookingId}, Vehicle Make : {vehical}, Service : {service}.
ServiceCentre.ServiceOrderCancel: User has cancelled the following Booking!! Booking Id : {bookingId}, Vehicle Make : {vehical}, Service : {service}, Pick Up Address : {pickAdd}, Pick Up Date and Time : {pickTime}, Drop Off Date and Time : {dropTime}, Total Amount:{totalAmount}, Payment mode : {paymentMod}.
